pkgmetadata.longdescription: Link Prediction Methods // Implementations of most of the existing proximity-based methods of link prediction in graphs. Among the 20 implemented methods are e.g.: Adamic L. and Adar E. (2003) doi:10.1016/S0378-8733(03)00009-1, Leicht E., Holme P., Newman M. (2006) doi:10.1103/PhysRevE.73.026120, Zhou T. and Zhang Y (2009) doi:10.1140/epjb/e2009-00335-8, and Fouss F., Pirotte A., Renders J., and Saerens M. (2007) doi:10.1109/TKDE.2007.46.
